verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329>Musician,<s%> A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%> In thee, O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> do I put my <S%H2620>trust;<s%> let me <S%H408>never<s%> <S%H5769><s%> be <S%H954>ashamed:<s%> <S%H6403>deliver<s%> me in thy <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>

Bow <S%H5186>down<s%> thine <S%H241>ear<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> me; <S%H5337>deliver<s%> me <S%H4120>speedily:<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> thou my <S%H4581>strong<s%> <S%H6697>rock,<s%> for a <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H4686>defense<s%> to <S%H3467>save<s%> me.
For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> art my <S%H5553>rock<s%> and my <S%H4686>fortress;<s%> therefore for thy name's <S%H4616>sake<s%> <S%H8034><s%> <S%H5148>lead<s%> me, and <S%H5095>guide<s%> me.
Pull me <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H4480>net<s%> <S%H7568><s%> <S%H2098>that<s%> they have laid <S%H2934>privily<s%> for me: <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> art my <S%H4581>strength.<s%>
Into thine <S%H3027>hand<s%> I <S%H6485>commit<s%> my <S%H7307>spirit:<s%> thou hast <S%H6299>redeemed<s%> me, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> of <S%H571>truth.<s%>
I have <S%H8130>hated<s%> them that <S%H8104>regard<s%> <S%H7723>lying<s%> <S%H1892>vanities:<s%> but <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H982>trust<s%> <S%H413>in<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

I will be <S%H1523>glad<s%> and <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in thy <S%H2617>mercy:<s%> <S%H834>for<s%> thou hast <S%H7200>considered<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H6040>trouble;<s%> thou hast <S%H3045>known<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> in <S%H6869>adversities;<s%>
And hast <S%H3808>not<s%> shut me <S%H5462>up<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H341>enemy:<s%> thou hast <S%H5975>set<s%> my <S%H7272>feet<s%> in a large <S%H4800>room.<s%>

Have <S%H2603>mercy<s%> upon me, O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> I am in <S%H6862>trouble:<s%> mine <S%H5869>eye<s%> is <S%H6244>consumed<s%> with <S%H3708>grief,<s%> yea, my <S%H5315>soul<s%> and my <S%H990>belly.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> my <S%H2416>life<s%> is <S%H3615>spent<s%> with <S%H3015>grief,<s%> and my <S%H8141>years<s%> with <S%H585>sighing:<s%> my <S%H3581>strength<s%> <S%H3782>faileth<s%> because of mine <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> and my <S%H6106>bones<s%> are <S%H6244>consumed.<s%>

I <S%H1961>was<s%> a <S%H2781>reproach<s%> among <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> mine <S%H6887>enemies,<s%> but <S%H3966>especially<s%> among my <S%H7934>neighbors,<s%> and a <S%H6343>fear<s%> to mine <S%H3045>acquaintance:<s%> they that did <S%H7200>see<s%> me <S%H2351>without<s%> <S%H5074>fled<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> me.
I am <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> as a dead <S%H4191>man<s%> out of <S%H4480>mind:<s%> <S%H3820><s%> I <S%H1961>am<s%> like a <S%H6>broken<s%> <S%H3627>vessel.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H1681>slander<s%> of <S%H7227>many:<s%> <S%H4032>fear<s%> was on every <S%H4480>side:<s%> <S%H5439><s%> while they took <S%H3245>counsel<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me, they <S%H2161>devised<s%> to take <S%H3947>away<s%> my <S%H5315>life.<s%>
But <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H982>trusted<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> thee, O <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H859>Thou<s%> art my <S%H430>God.<s%>

My <S%H6256>times<s%> are in thy <S%H3027>hand:<s%> <S%H5337>deliver<s%> me from the <S%H4480>hand<s%> <S%H3027><s%> of mine <S%H341>enemies,<s%> and from them that <S%H4480>persecute<s%> <S%H7291><s%> me.
Make thy <S%H6440>face<s%> to <S%H215>shine<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> thy <S%H5650>servant:<s%> <S%H3467>save<s%> me for thy <S%H2617>mercies'<s%> sake.

Let me <S%H408>not<s%> be <S%H954>ashamed,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> I have called <S%H7121>upon<s%> thee: let the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> be <S%H954>ashamed,<s%> and let them be <S%H1826>silent<s%> in the <S%H7585>grave.<s%>

Let the <S%H8267>lying<s%> <S%H8193>lips<s%> be put to <S%H481>silence;<s%> which <S%H1696>speak<s%> grievous <S%H6277>things<s%> <S%H1346>proudly<s%> and <S%H937>contemptuously<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous.<s%>

Oh <S%H4100>how<s%> <S%H7227>great<s%> is thy <S%H2898>goodness,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou hast laid <S%H6845>up<s%> for them that <S%H3373>fear<s%> thee; which thou hast <S%H6466>wrought<s%> for them that <S%H2620>trust<s%> in thee <S%H5048>before<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men!<s%>

Thou shalt <S%H5641>hide<s%> them in the <S%H5643>secret<s%> of thy <S%H6440>presence<s%> from the <S%H4480>pride<s%> <S%H7407><s%> of <S%H376>man:<s%> thou shalt keep them <S%H6845>secretly<s%> in a <S%H5521>pavilion<s%> from the <S%H4480>strife<s%> <S%H7379><s%> of <S%H3956>tongues.<s%>
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> he hath showed me his marvelous <S%H6381>kindness<s%> <S%H2617><s%> in a <S%H4692>strong<s%> <S%H5892>city.<s%>

For <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> in my <S%H2648>haste,<s%> I am cut <S%H1629>off<s%> from <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H5048><s%> thine <S%H5869>eyes:<s%> <S%H403>nevertheless<s%> thou <S%H8085>heardest<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of my <S%H8469>supplications<s%> when I <S%H7768>cried<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee.

O <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> ye his <S%H2623>saints:<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5341>preserveth<s%> the <S%H539>faithful,<s%> and <S%H5921>plentifully<s%> <S%H3499><s%> <S%H7999>rewardeth<s%> the <S%H1346>proud<s%> <S%H6213>doer.<s%>
Be of good <S%H2388>courage,<s%> and he shall <S%H553>strengthen<s%> your <S%H3824>heart,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> ye that <S%H3176>hope<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
